name: Hand of Glory
description: Does not stack with any other bonus Ring slot.
lore: Cut from the body of a criminal on the gibbet; pickled in salt and the urine of man, woman, dog, horse, and mare; smoked with herbs and hay for a month; hung on an oak tree for three nights running; laid at a crossroads; and finally hung on a church door for one night. Now worn around your neck, for an extra ring slot.
